verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> toward Gog<WH1463>, of the land<WH776> of Magog<WH4031>, the prince<WH5387> of Rosh<WH7218>, Meshech<WH4902>, and Tubal<WH8422>, and prophesy against him<WH5012>,
and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Behold<WH1463>, I am against thee, O Gog, prince<WH7218> of Rosh<WH7218>, Meshech<WH4902>, and Tubal<WH8422>:

and I will turn thee about<WH7725>, and put<WH5414> hooks<WH2397> into thy jaws<WH3895>, and I will bring thee forth<WH3318>, and all thine army<WH2428>, horses<WH5483> and horsemen<WH6571>, all of them clothed<WH3847> in full<WH4358> armor<WH7227>, a great company<WH6951> with buckler<WH6793> and shield<WH4043>, all of them handling<WH8610> swords<WH2719>;
Persia <WH6539>, Cush<WH3568>, and Put<WH6316> with them<WH4043>, all of them with shield and helmet<WH3553>;

Gomer <WH1586>, and all his hordes<WH102>; the house<WH1004> of Togarmah<WH8425> in the uttermost parts<WH3411> of the north<WH6828>, and all his hordes<WH102>; even many<WH7227> peoples with thee<WH5971>.
Be thou prepared<WH3559>, yea<WH3559>, prepare thyself<WH6951>, thou, and all thy companies that are assembled<WH6950> unto thee<WH4929>, and be thou a guard unto them.

After many<WH7227> days<WH3117> thou shalt be visited<WH6485>: in the latter<WH319> years<WH8141> thou shalt come<WH935> into the land<WH776> that is brought back<WH7725> from the sword<WH2719>, that is gathered<WH6908> out of many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971>, upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, which have been a continual<WH8548> waste<WH2723>; but it is brought forth<WH3318> out of the peoples<WH5971>, and they shall dwell<WH3427> securely<WH983>, all of them.

And thou shalt ascend<WH5927>, thou shalt come<WH935> like a storm<WH7722>, thou shalt be like a cloud<WH6051> to cover<WH3680> the land<WH776>, thou<WH102>, and all thy hordes, and many<WH7227> peoples with thee<WH5971>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: It shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that things<WH1697> shall come<WH5927> into thy mind<WH3824>, and thou shalt devise<WH2803> an evil<WH7451> device<WH4284>:

and thou shalt say<WH559>, I will go up<WH5927> to the land<WH776> of unwalled villages<WH6519>; I will go<WH935> to them that are at rest<WH8252>, that dwell<WH3427> securely<WH983>, all of them dwelling<WH3427> without walls<WH2346>, and having neither bars<WH1280> nor gates<WH1817>;

to take<WH7997> the spoil<WH7998> and to take<WH962> the prey<WH957>; to turn<WH7725> thy hand<WH3027> against the waste places<WH2723> that are now inhabited<WH3427>, and against the people<WH5971> that are gathered<WH622> out of the nations<WH1471>, that have gotten<WH6213> cattle<WH4735> and goods<WH7075>, that dwell<WH3427> in the middle<WH2872> of the earth<WH776>.

Sheba <WH7614>, and Dedan<WH1719>, and the merchants<WH5503> of Tarshish<WH8659>, with all the young lions<WH3715> thereof<WH559>, shall say unto thee<WH935>, Art thou come to take<WH7997> the spoil<WH7998>? hast thou assembled<WH6950> thy company<WH6951> to take<WH962> the prey<WH957>? to carry away<WH5375> silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091>, to take away<WH3947> cattle<WH4735> and goods<WH7075>, to take<WH7997> great<WH1419> spoil<WH7998>?

Therefore <WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012>, and say<WH559> unto Gog<WH1463>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: In that day<WH3117> when my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> dwelleth<WH3427> securely<WH983>, shalt thou not know it<WH3045>?

And thou shalt come<WH935> from thy place<WH4725> out of the uttermost parts<WH3411> of the north<WH6828>, thou<WH7227>, and many peoples<WH5971> with thee<WH7392>, all of them riding upon horses<WH5483>, a great<WH1419> company<WH6951> and a mighty<WH7227> army<WH2428>;

and thou shalt come up<WH5927> against my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, as a cloud<WH6051> to cover<WH3680> the land<WH776>: it shall come to pass in the latter<WH319> days<WH3117>, that I will bring<WH935> thee against my land<WH776>, that the nations<WH1471> may know<WH3045> me<WH6942>, when I shall be sanctified in thee<WH1463>, O Gog, before their eyes<WH5869>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Art thou he of whom I spake<WH1696> in old<WH6931> time<WH3117> by<WH3027> my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030> of Israel<WH3478>, that prophesied<WH5012> in those days<WH3117> for many years<WH8141> that I would bring thee against them<WH935>?

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, when<WH3117> Gog<WH1463> shall come<WH935> against the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, that my wrath<WH2534> shall come up<WH5927> into my nostrils<WH639>.

For in my jealousy<WH7068> and in the fire<WH784> of my wrath<WH5678> have I spoken<WH1696>, Surely in that day<WH3117> there shall be a great<WH1419> shaking<WH7494> in the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>;

so that the fishes<WH1709> of the sea<WH3220>, and the birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064>, and the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704>, and all creeping things<WH7431> that creep<WH7430> upon the earth<WH127>, and all the men<WH120> that are upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>, shall shake<WH7493> at my presence<WH6440>, and the mountains<WH2022> shall be thrown down<WH2040>, and the steep places<WH4095> shall fall<WH5307>, and every wall<WH2346> shall fall<WH5307> to the ground<WH776>.

And I will call<WH7121> for a sword<WH2719> against him unto all my mountains<WH2022>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: every man<WH376>'s sword<WH2719> shall be against his brother<WH251>.

And with pestilence<WH1698> and with blood<WH1818> will I enter into judgment<WH8199> with him<WH4305>; and I will rain upon him<WH102>, and upon his hordes, and upon the many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971> that are with him<WH7857>, an overflowing shower<WH1653>, and great hailstones<WH417>, fire<WH784>, and brimstone<WH1614>.

And I will magnify<WH1431> myself<WH6942>, and sanctify myself<WH3045>, and I will make myself known in the eyes<WH5869> of many<WH7227> nations<WH1471>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.
